name: Targeting Computer
Lore: 'Specially designed for use on Rebel starfighters. Assists pilots on torpedo runs. Automatically locks on pre-programmed target points.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on any starship. Adds 1 to starship''s maneuver. If this starship is using a weapon during a battle, you may fire that weapon twice, separately or combined. Subtract 1 from each destiny draw when firing.',
